text: Alphonse Laveran (Charles Louis Alphonse Laveran, 18 June 1845 18 May 1922) was a French military doctor. He won the 1907 Nobel Prize in Physiology or Medicine, for his work on the way protozoa can cause disease. ==References== Category:1845 births Category:1922 deaths Category:French academics Category:French military people Category:French Nobel Prize winners Category:French physicians Category:Scientists from Paris
title: Alphonse Laveran
